messages.subject: FW: [AlwaysUnschooled] Unschooling article in Chicago Sun-Times
messages.msgSnippet: The unschooling article I mentioned in a previous message is in today s Chicago Sun-Times at http://www.suntimes.com/news/184566,CST-NWS-unskul24.article It s
messages.messageBody:
The unschooling article I mentioned in a previous message is in
today's Chicago Sun-Times at
http://www.suntimes.com/news/184566,CST-NWS-unskul24.article

It's an excellent, highly favorable overview. I think the reporter did
a great job, especially considering that unschooling was such a new
concept for her.

My only disappointment is that the emphasis is on academics, not on
the development of personal qualities such as kindness and empathy -
EQ instead of IQ. I hope academics won't always be the yardstick we're
measured by. But all in all, I'm really pleased with the article.

Jan Hunt
Natural Child Project
www.naturalchild.org





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
